alert.note: Alert for Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 3:48PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Pennington County through 415 PM MDT... At 348 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over northwestern Rapid City, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Rapid Valley around 400 PM MDT. Southern Ellsworth Air Force Base and Box Elder around 405 PM MDT. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 54 and 66. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM MDT for west central South Dakota.
